longDescription.value: IdeaMe is a simple way to store and manage your ideas. Use IdeaMe to: create ideas, categorise ideas, add notes, add photos and add voice notes. It also works in offline mode (provided that you've signed in already), is super light on mobile data and offers sign in via Facebook, Google, Email or Anonymously if you'd prefer just to test the app.

shortDescription.value: Have great ideas and no where to store them? You've come to the right place.
